title: Distribution of Instagram.com traffic 2019 , by country
summary: This is a bar chart representing Country in the x axis and Share of desktop traffic in the y axis.
The Share of desktop traffic is appeared to be the highest at Country United States and lowest at Country Turkey.
The difference of Share of desktop traffic between the highest and lowest Country is 14.53.
min_summary: This is a bar chart representing Country in the x axis and Share of desktop traffic in the y axis.
The Share of desktop traffic is highest at Country United States and lowest at Country Turkey.
mid_summary: This is a bar chart representing Country in the x axis and Share of desktop traffic in the y axis.
The Share of desktop traffic is appeared to be the highest at Country United States and lowest at Country Turkey.
The difference of Share of desktop traffic between the highest and lowest Country is 14.53.
max_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Share of desktop traffic for 5 number of Countrys.
The Share of desktop traffic is appeared to be the highest at Country United States and lowest at Country Turkey.
There is a difference of 14.53 between the maximum Country United States and minimum Country Turkey.
The Country United States has the highest Share of desktop traffic, followed by Brazil, and Russia. Down to the Country Turkey which is the lowest.
The highest value 17.77 at United States is almost 2.23 times larger than the average value 7.98.
Summing up the values of all Countrys, we get total 39.89.
